explanation: [0-0] A man wearing a red and white striped shirt, black pants, and white gloves is standing by the glass wall of a pool. A man in a gray shirt and shorts opposite him is waving to him.

[0-7] The man in the red shirt thinks he is going to give him a high five, so he raises his hand too. The man in gray walks up to the man in red and suddenly puts his hand on his own hair. The man in red looks at him awkwardly. The man in gray comes to the side of the man in red and turns to look at him. The man in red then puts his hand on the man in gray's head and touches it, then puts his hand in front of him and looks at it again. The man in gray laughs and points to a person in red on the left holding a cell phone, signaling that he wants to take a picture with the man in red.
